name: AsystMe, LLC
tag_list: proactive-automated-assistant, automated-assistant, predictive-automated-assistant, smart-mobile-services, context-aware, context, mobile, cloud, task-automation
overview:
AsystMe is an early stage provider of Proactive Automated Assistant Software.

Like a human personal assistant, our software proactively informs and makes suggestions that save time or money. As with a human assistant, our software knows the user’s situation (context) and anticipates needs.

Our assistant (patent pending) is comprised of an open, cloud-based platform, a variety of “assistant services” and our smartphone app. The platform manages knowledge of the user’s context, hosts services (each interacting with a data source and automating a task), allows collaboration between services, and manages interactions (voice or text) with users. The platform pushes notifications to a user via our smartphone app, which will be available for each of the popular smartphone platforms.

We make it easy for developers to create additional “assistant services.” AsystMe and its ecosystem will develop a wide range of services; some will inform, others will manage a facet of life (e.g., exercise program, shopping) or manage a device (e.g. car, home automation system).
